name: Ghosts of the Pasts
description:
This is a submission to the BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2020.2

Theme: Rewind

-An homage to Pacman where your every move will return to haunt you.

-Watch out for the deadly ghosts, they will replay  your movements from previous rounds.

-Once a tile has been stepped on three times it becomes deadly.

-controls: WASD, mouse for menu buttons
